title: Title
message_showStatisticsButton: Button to slide down the viewing statistics.
message_inputField: Input field shows current video time. Can be edited.
playbackRateButton: Playback rate button. Select playback rate from dropdown.
embedButton: Embed button. Select embed size from dropdown.
creator: Creator
error_AudioCodecNotSupported: Error: The audio codec is not supported by this browser
error_AudioElementNotSupported: Error: Your browser does not support the audio element.
error_videoLoading: The video is loading. Please wait a moment.
error_audioLoading: The audio is loading. Please wait a moment.
msg_videoLoadedSuccessfully: The video has been loaded successfully.
msg_audioLoadedSuccessfully: The audio has been loaded successfully.
msg_videoBuffering: The video is currently buffering. Please wait a moment.
msg_videoBufferedSuccessfullyAndAutoplay: The video has been buffered successfully and is now autoplaying.
msg_videoBufferedSuccessfully: The video has been buffered successfully.
hasToBeSmallerThanDuration: has to be smaller than the duration
msg_waitToSetTime: Please wait until the video has been loaded to set a time.
msg_startPlayingToSetTime: Please start playing the video once to set a time.
msg_waitToSeek: Please wait until the video has been loaded to seek.
msg_startPlayingToSeek: Please start playing the video once to seek.
enterUsernamePassword: Please enter your username and password:
loggingOut: You are being logged out, please wait a moment.
loginSuccessful: Successfully logged in. Please reload the page if the page does not reload automatically.
logoutSuccessful: Successfully logged out. Please reload the page if the page does not reload automatically.
